name: Call Sniper Duty: Army Strike
description:
Call Sniper Duty: Army Strike - First Person shooter, it's time call of counter against the snipers in the winter offensive. Mark, aim & extract in this premium game of tactical & action shooting missions. You are the best sniper & getting the fast action packed terrorist needs modern warfare sniper 3d skills & tactical shooters.
* Features ***
** Best sniper war shooting
** snow mountain , desert & island missions with real 3d graphics
** real battle war action
** action shoot fire
** sniper 3d missions
** smart enemy AI
